keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: After a 7-0 loss to the Red Bulls at home in May, New York City F.C. regrouped for a 2-0 victory and moved into first place in the Eastern Conference.

headline.print_headline: Led by Its Rookie Forward, New York City F.C. Exacts Revenge Over a Rival
headline.main: New York City F.C. Exacts Revenge Over Rival Red Bulls

snippet: After a 7-0 loss to the Red Bulls at home in May, New York City F.C. regrouped for a 2-0 victory and moved into first place in the Eastern Conference....
abstract: New York City Football Club beats New York Red Bulls, 2-0, in MLS action.
